summary: Since this mod is still in development, it does not require Paradise Halls yet, but is might be needed later on.
descriptionHtml:
Well, this is actually the first time that I use Creation Kit to actually make a Mod on my own, so there might be some problems in this Mod, but I will fix them, so please report if you see any bugs.
        This Hideout has two parts: Upper Slave Hideout; where you can rest, but not quite finished yet, and Underground Jail; where you can place your slaves, and they won\'t escape.
       

        Ps. the NPCs you see in the images that I uploaded might be different from yours, this is because I used some Mods to improve the looks of NPCs, the MOD however, do not need that in order to run.

Credits:
Thanks layam for making this nice MOD.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29886//?

and Emotika which gave me the idea of this MOD.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33462/?
author: Baldeforger
